00014 #include "ISABThread.h"
00015 
00026 class WriteLock
00027 {
00028   public:
00032    inline WriteLock();
00033 
00037    ~WriteLock(){ }
00038    
00043    inline bool requestRead();
00044 
00050    inline void finishRead();
00051 
00056    inline bool requestWrite();
00057 
00063    inline void finishWrite();
00064 
00069    inline bool requestDelete();   
00070 
00071    
00072   private:
00074    ISABMonitor m_monitor;
00075    
00079    uint32 m_nbrOfReaders;
00080 
00081    
00085    uint32 m_nbrOfWriters;
00086 
00088    bool m_writing;
00089 
00091    bool m_deleting;
00092    
00093 };

00095 // ========================================================================
00096 //                                  Implementation of the inlined methods =
00097 
00098 WriteLock::
00099 WriteLock()
00100 {
00101    m_nbrOfReaders  = 0;
00102    m_nbrOfWriters  = 0;
00103    m_deleting       = false;
00104 }
00105 
00106 
00107 bool 
00108 WriteLock::requestRead()
00109 {
00110    ISABSync synchronized(m_monitor);
00111    if(m_deleting)
00112       return false;
00113    m_nbrOfReaders++;
00114    return true;
00115 }
00116 
00117 void
00118 WriteLock::finishRead()
00119 {
00120    ISABSync synchronized(m_monitor);
00121    m_nbrOfReaders--;
00122    if(m_nbrOfReaders == 0)
00123       m_monitor.notifyAll();
00124 }
00125 
00126 
00127 
00128 bool
00129 WriteLock::requestWrite()
00130 {
00131    ISABSync synchronized(m_monitor);
00132    if(m_deleting)
00133       return false;
00134    m_nbrOfWriters++;
00135    while((m_writing) || (m_nbrOfReaders != 0)){
00136       try {
00137          m_monitor.wait();
00138       }
00139       catch(const JTCInterruptedException &) {
00140          mc2log << warn <<  "Fifo::dequeue wait interrupted!" << endl;
00141       }
00142    }
00143    m_writing = true;
00144    return true;
00145 }
00146 
00147 void
00148 WriteLock::finishWrite()
00149 {
00150    ISABSync synchronized(m_monitor);
00151    m_nbrOfWriters--;
00152    m_writing = false;
00153    if(m_nbrOfWriters == 0)
00154       m_monitor.notifyAll();
00155 }
00156 
00157 bool
00158 WriteLock::requestDelete()
00159 {
00160    ISABSync synchronized(m_monitor);
00161    if(m_deleting)
00162       return false;
00163    m_deleting = true;   
00164    while((m_nbrOfWriters != 0) || (m_nbrOfReaders != 0)){
00165       try {
00166          mc2dbg4 << "Nbr of writers = " << m_nbrOfWriters << endl;
00167          mc2dbg4 << "Nbr of readers = " << m_nbrOfReaders << endl;
00168          m_monitor.wait();
00169       }
00170       catch(const JTCInterruptedException &) {
00171          mc2log << warn <<  "Fifo::dequeue wait interrupted!" << endl;
00172       }
00173    }
00174    return true;
00175 }
